title: Purgatory Pizza
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. New York style pizzas. Has vegan pizza whole pies available as well as a vegan chicken sandwich (Gardein brand) and vegan calzone (your choice of filling), made to order. Uses Daiya vegan cheese, Fieldroast sausages. Very basic setup with old-school wood table and bench seating.
